version_description: Updates and minor bug fixes to ensure compatibility with future IOS devices and operating systems.

Updated to latest Dropbox And Google Drive interfaces. Should improve both upload and downloading of scripts, videos and audio files from these services.

Thanks again to everyone who has given us feedback. We appreciate it and are always working to improve our apps!

- Fixes issue with logging into Google Drive for the first time
- Addresses problem with MIDI remotes.

Thanks again for everyone who reported these issues. Please let us know if you are having a problem by sending an email to support@bombingbrain.com
More updates to fix some Google Drive issues. Thanks for the feedback, help and patience while we resolve these issues.
